Articles.Content: hey guys we all love ksp but if you guys add multiplayer the game would be a heck of a lot better

The official word is that it's a planned free expansion for after 1.0. In the meantime you could try the [Dark Multiplayer mod](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/79111-DarkMultiPlayer-0-2-0-2-KSP-0-90-Alpha), which adds multiplayer play right now.

This suggestion is so common that it's on our [What Not To Suggest list](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/36863-What-not-to-suggest), so I'm afraid I have to lock this.
